# BuilderConditional

**Structure**

A conditional result from a result builder.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen struct BuilderConditional<TrueContent, FalseContent>
```

## Overview

Don’t use this type directly. The result builders defined by the framework, like [doc://com.apple.Charts/documentation/Charts/ChartContentBuilder] and [doc://com.apple.Charts/documentation/Charts/AxisContentBuilder], use it as part of the building process.

## Conforms To

- AxisContent
- AxisMark
- Chart3DContent
- ChartContent
- Copyable
title: BuilderConditional
